title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly define the project scope, objectives, key requirements, and constraints for the LeadershipStyleAnalyzer system. Identify the target users, use cases, and data sources. Outline the system architecture, including components for data ingestion, processing, analysis, and reporting. Consider integration with existing systems, scalability, security, and compliance requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop Data Collection and Processing Pipeline
description: Build the pipeline for collecting and processing leadership behavior data from various sources.

title: Implement Leadership Analysis Model
description: Develop the AI model for analyzing leadership behaviors and generating insights.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Create the user interface for presenting leadership analysis results and insights.

title: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Establish testing strategies, frameworks, and processes for ensuring system quality.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to relevant security and compliance standards.

title: Plan and Execute System Deployment
description: Develop deployment strategies and automate the deployment process for the LeadershipStyleAnalyzer system.
dependencies: Develop Data Collection and Processing Pipeline

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive user documentation and training materials for the LeadershipStyleAnalyzer system.
